pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fetches Data on Covid-19 Mobility Trends from Different Sources // Scrapes trends in mobility after the Covid-19 outbreak from different sources. Currently, the package scrapes data from Google https://www.google.com/covid19/mobility/, Apple https://www.apple.com/covid19/mobility, and will add others. The data returned uses the tidy Covid19R project data standard https://covid19r.github.io/documentation/ as well as the controlled vocabularies for measurement types.
